Articles.Content:
Well i was busy at the actual time. So i didn\'t get to see it on the clock.

Lest We Forget.

Well i was busy at the actual time. So i didn\'t get to see it on the clock.

Lest We Forget.

Second try at 11:11 11/11/11 in just under 6 hours.

Oh, I thought this was about Skyrim.

Nevermind, then. I\'ll just go back to that.

Last time 11:11 (PM) on 11/11/11 came up in my time zone, a tornado hit a town about twenty miles north of where I am now, and killed or injured a total of 11 people. How\'s THAT for a weird coincidence? (It was known in the news media as 'the tornado of the elevens...')

I think 11/11 should still be called armistice day, for WWI, and there should be two other days for V-E day and V-J day. They each deserve their own day. We are getting ripped off of two more days off of work.

Love the wankel rotary engine FoX!

Well, in 11/11/11 11:00 am aprox... here in Mexico City, Francisco Blake Mora, the Mexican Interior Minister, died in an helicopter crash! It\'s the second time in this government that an Interior Minister died in a plane crash. It has been only 3 years since the last accident.

The news showed lived images of the destroyed helicopter. All of the crew members died. It was too horrible.

I don\'t know if it was a coincidence, but it was too bad!

Lest we forget the brave soldiers.

In Flander\'s fields

Where poppies grow

Between the crosses, row on row

The larks still, bravely, fly

Amidst the guns below.
